    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractElectronicScale
    Abstract base class of electronic scales on which can be placed one or more items.

    Methods in com.jjjwelectronics.scale with parameters of type IElectronicScale
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    ElectronicScaleListener.theMassOnTheScaleHasChanged(IElectronicScale scale, Mass mass)
    Announces that the mass on the indicated scale has changed.
    void
    ElectronicScaleListener.theMassOnTheScaleHasExceededItsLimit(IElectronicScale scale)
    Announces that excessive mass has been placed on the indicated scale.
    void
    ElectronicScaleListener.theMassOnTheScaleNoLongerExceedsItsLimit(IElectronicScale scale)
    Announces that the former excessive mass has been removed from the indicated scale, and it is again able to measure mass.
